descriptions.content: Managed a team of 5 developing a 2D side-scrolling ARPG as game designer and artist using Unity. Drafted main plot, drew main characters with animations and produced particle effects.
Implemented and analyzed a tentative version of BBR congestion control on Mininet, shortened average max RTT by 81.9% from 127ms to 23ms.
Achieved ACC of 0.86 and AUC of 0.93 on Kaggle Amazon reviews dataset with 400,000 reviews, by performing series of dimension reduction on features and applying SVM model.

Developed and deployed a RESTful API agent on Google Cloud for easier use of Facebook Graph API. Built responsive website and Android app leveraging agent, allowing users to search Facebook featured contents.
Devised unique national focus tree for Greece with ideology oriented branches, plotted around 30 new events for mediterranean countries, improved advanced gameplay as Greece.

Designed a toy car controlled via Bluetooth, following principle of Hardware/Software Co-design, using FPGA-CPU and ported Ucore as softcore and operating system respectively. Won Outstanding Undergraduate Thesis Award (first class) from Computer Science department.
Ported Unix-like operating system, ucore, from x86 to MIPS with one of classmates, to match FPGA-based softcore in MIPS architecture. Focused on exceptions and interrupts.
Collaborated in building a simulated TCP/IP protocol suite enabling two hosts to communicate. Led a team of 4 and directed implementation of transport layer to completely support TCP and UDP.

Designed a 5-segment pipelined CPU running at 100MHz with forwarding on Nexys4 Board, following MIPS 32-bit instruction set, in Spartan-6 family. Implemented interfaces for high baud rate serial port and SRAM.
Built a WinPhone game for Imagine Cup 2012 based on XNA, with an UI/UX designer. Won second prize from Imagine Cup 2012 - Huazhong University of Science and Technology Campus Challenge.
